snippet: Inspired by impatience with Congress and the Canadian Parliament, states and provinces are taking it upon themselves to do something.
abstract: Editorial welcomes joining of British Columbia, Canada, to California, Oregon and Washington in new Pacific Coast Action Plan on Climate and Energy, which aims to step up adoption of clean energy and link carbon pricing plans; notes coalition has been inspired by impatience with national governments to face the reality of climate change.
lead_paragraph: Inspired by impatience with Congress and the Canadian Parliament, states and provinces are taking it upon themselves to do something.

headline.main: A New Alliance on Climate Change
headline.print_headline: A New Alliance on Climate Change
